comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Grand_Duchess_Tatiana_Nikolaevna_of..., second daughter of Tsar Nicholas II, the last monarch of Russia, and of Tsarina Alexandra. NYT of September 25, 1916 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F10615FC345B17738... indicates that Grand Duchess Tatiana Nicolaevna (and the Czarina and Grand Duchess Olga), "dressed in the simple costume of hospital nurses" accepted fifteen ambulances donated by a group of Americans.

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content: swanq: Thanks for the info on the Grand Duchess and for explaining her outfit in this case. We will add the details and the context when updating the record.
